definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: So-called choices are just illusions which have never existed.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的選擇只是個未曾存在的虛像。

sentences.english: Intend to show a spiritual depth instead of the virtual image of three-dimensional distance.
sentences.chinese: 意圖以心靈空間深度取代三度空間距離的虛像。
